description: WSP is one of the world's leading professional services consulting firms. We are dedicated to our local communities and propelled by international brainpower. We are technical experts and strategic advisors including engineers, technicians, scientists, architects, planners, surveyors and environmental specialists, as well as other design, program and construction management professionals. We design lasting solutions in the Transportation & Infrastructure, Property & Buildings, Earth & Environment, Power & Energy, Resources and Industry sectors, as well as offering strategic advisory services.

This role is to work as part of an engineering consultancy design team, taking a role in project design work, focused on production and liaison with the WSP PB's Team and mentoring and coaching junior members of the team. WSP is one of the world's leading professional services consulting firms dedicated to local communities and propelled by international brainpower.

Leads community health initiatives, epidemiology research, and government programs. This role involves working on public health projects, conducting research, and implementing health programs to improve community health outcomes.
qualifications: Master's in Public Health or related field

description: Grant Thornton Bharat is expanding its Public Health Advisory practice and is looking for professionals who are passionate about strengthening health systems and driving impact at scale. We are looking for candidates with experience in public health policy and program implementation, health systems strengthening, digital health, health financing, one health, MCH, or related areas.
qualifications: Master's degree in public health, Health & Hospital Administration, Management Studies, Economics, Public Policy, or related field
experience: 8-12+ years in strategy, stakeholder engagement, and leadership in large-scale health programs

description: The Public Health Foundation of India (PHFI) is working towards building a healthier India. It is helping to address the limited institutional and systems capacity in India by strengthening education and training, advancing research and technology and facilitating policy and practice in the area of Public Health. The position will play a pivotal role in supporting the Health Department, Government of Bihar, in advancing public health initiatives through strategic coordination, documentation, data-driven decision-making, and innovation.
qualifications: MBA, Post Graduate in Hospital Management/Health Management, Masters in Public Health
experience: Minimum five years' experience in Healthcare / Hospital setting

description: We need faculty position for Health Care, Public Health, Management. This is an academic position requiring expertise in public health education and research.
qualifications: PhD in Public Health or related field

description: The Public Health Foundation of India (PHFI) is working towards building a healthier India. The position will play a pivotal role in supporting the Health Department, Government of Bihar, in advancing public health initiatives through strategic coordination, documentation, data-driven decision-making, and innovation. Key responsibilities include interdepartmental coordination, documentation and communication, data analytics for decision support, innovation and process improvement, capacity building support, and technical assistance.
qualifications: MBA, Post Graduate in Hospital Management/Health Management, Masters in Public Health
experience: Minimum five years' experience in Healthcare / Hospital setting
